word: But although the Pharisees thought so highly of themselves, they were really in a worse condition than the ones they despised. The publicans were less bigoted and self-sufficient, and thus were more open to the influence of truth. Jesus said to the rabbis, \93Go ye and learn what that meaneth, I will have mercy, and not sacrifice.\94 Thus He showed that while they claimed to expound the word of God, they were wholly ignorant of its spirit.  Ibid., p. 275.34
